articles.author: Tom Murray
articles.title: Barbenheimer latest news: Barbie and Oppenheimer reviews land ahead of release day - The Independent
articles.description: ‘Barbie’ starring Margot Robbie and Ryan Gosling, and ‘Oppenheimer’ starring Cillian Murphy and Florence Pugh, are both released on 21 July
articles.content:
Barbie: The Album unveils full tracklist
As Barbie arrives in cinemas on Friday (21 July), the long-awaited soundtrack will drop too.
While songs from Dua Lipa, Billie Eilish, and Nicki Minaj and I… [+674 chars]
